title: Cowboy kled
body: Just imagine the beautiful cowboy kled

sorry, i fell in love with my own idea , Jurassic kled...

just imagine, Alan Grant ridin' on a velociraptor
Yes best idea ever. If he throws a laso whith his q en like if he would ride a horse.
Wow that seems amazing. I would love to see that skin.
Not sure if I'd be into it, but Kled definitely needs a better skin than Sir Kled. I'm really not a fan.

It probably obvious but cows dont walk on 2 leggs, and i cant see how would you manage to do the thing

JURASSIC KLED , velociraptors are much cooler.... and walk on 2 legs
i rides a horse and has a laso and it doesnt have to walk on two legs man
Nobody plays him, could be good. But its just not worthy to make it expensive. But its ok.
